name: Pixel Breaker
description:
Weekly Challenge:

Funny challenges to play with your friends.
Every week a new one !!!

Enter new challenge ideas on our homepage
http://www.enigwin.com/weekly-challenge/

Description:
Help the Pixel Breaker collect Nanobot Pixels for points and destroy enemies along the way. Pixel Breaker includes 30 levels of frenzied awesomeness, great tunes, Facebook friend challenges and highly addictive gameplay. More on the way! Go for it!

Gameplay:
Guide our hero to the end of each level by navigating floating platforms in space.
Swipe left, right, up and down to move the hero. Once the hero is in motion, he doesn't stop so swipe cautiously!
Reach the end of the level and jump into the portal to advance to the next level.
Avoid falling off the edges.
1 hit from enemies takes you back to the start screen.
